description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure issue related to CVE-2024-20680 affecting the Windows Message Queuing Client (MSMQC), it is essential to apply the relevant security updates as outlined below:

1. Identify your operating system and architecture (x64 or ARM64).
2. Download and install the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5034123: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5034122: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - For Windows Server 2022, apply KB5034130: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)
   - Additional updates for other versions can be found in the provided links.
3. Restart the system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the information disclosure vulnerability which could allow an attacker to read portions of heap memory.
- Ensure that your system is compatible with the update by checking the build numbers provided. Important build numbers include: 10.0.19044.3930, 10.0.22631.3007, and others applicable based on your operating system version.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is up to date with all previous security updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
